name: ITP-006 - Riprap
Riprap
1 - Site Preparation
ACTIVITY TASK - Site Clearance
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Site clear of debris and vegetation
FREQUENCY - Once
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Visual Inspection
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - R
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - W
2 - Material (1)
ACTIVITY TASK - Filter Cloth
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Approved filter cloth with class 1 filtration and class C strength class - Bidim A49 or equivalent
FREQUENCY - Prior to placing order
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Suppliers Documentation
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - R
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - R
2 - Material (2)
ACTIVITY TASK - Rock Boulders criteria
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - According to WDC Physical work Section E.6. Rip Rap Specification Section 2 page 856
FREQUENCY - Prior to placing order
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Suppliers Documentation
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - H
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - R
2 - Material (3)
ACTIVITY TASK - RIP-RAP grading
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - According to WDC Physical work Section E.6. Rip Rap Specification Section 3 page 856
FREQUENCY - Upon delivery of material
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Suppliers Documentation
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - R
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - W
3 - Initial set out
ACTIVITY TASK - Survey
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As per drawings and provided design model
FREQUENCY - Prior to subgrade preparation
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Visual inspection
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - H
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - H
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
4 - Subgrade Prep (1)
ACTIVITY TASK - Trim subgrade to suit
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As per drawing and provided design model
FREQUENCY - Prior to placing Geotextile
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Survey – As-built surface
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - H
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - R
4 - Subgrade Prep (2)
ACTIVITY TASK - Place Geotextile
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As per drawings and specification.
FREQUENCY - Prior to placing RIP- RAP material
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Visual Inspection, Photos
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - R
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - R
5 - RIP-RAP Placement
ACTIVITY TASK - Install RIP-RAP stones
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - According to WDC Physical work Section E.6. Rip Rap Specification Section 4 page 856 with approved machinery.
FREQUENCY - During and Upon completion of work
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Survey As-built topography Photos, Visual Inspection
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - H
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - H
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
6 - Maintenance
ACTIVITY TASK - Maintain RIP RAP protection until accepted by Engineer
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As required
FREQUENCY - Upon completion of the works
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - Visual Inspections
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - H
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - R
7 - As-Built Plans
ACTIVITY TASK - Survey
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As accepted by the Engineer
FREQUENCY - Upon completion of the works
CERTIFYING DOCUMENTATION, RECORD OR CHECKSHEET - As-built plans
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: INTERNAL VERIFICATION AUTHORITY OR RESPONSIBILITY - H
VERIFICATION SIGN OFFS: CRITICAL HOLD POINT AUTHORITY - R
